PROPER_NAME: This is displayed in the tooltip.
DESCRIPTION: This is displayed in the tooltip. Spaces should not be used be avoided in NAMES, with the exception of multi-word keywords (see next entry).
Make sure the first element in NAMES has no underscores. The rest should use _ in the place of spaces. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.
When played, randomly #yExhaust a card from the draw pile and play it at the end of the turn.
Limited to this turn. When played, randomly #Exhaust a card from the draw pile and play it at the end of the turn.
Will not be #yExhausted by #yBrand and will not be stamped with #yBrand.
Transform into a #yBlack #yDragon, gain #b10 Armor, and randomly grant #yExhaust and #yBrand to a card in your hand.
Transform into a #yWhite #yDragon, duplicate a card in your hand, and grant #yBrand to it.
Transform into a #yTrue #yDragon, gain #b6 [E] , draw #b6 cards, and the next #b6 cards played cost #b1 less [E] .
Every time a card is #Exhausted by #yBrand, apply #b1 #yScorch.
Take additional damage every time receive damage.

The damage of all Attack cards randomly increases by #b7 - #b14 each turn. Gain an equal amount of #yDexterity or #yStrength when gaining #yStrength or #yDexterity. Gain #b1 #yDexterity when entering #yBlack #yDragon #yForm and #b1 #yStrength when entering #yWhite #yDragon #yForm.
